entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
